goal.en: This course is taught from Tang and Five Dynasties Ci to Southern Song Ci. In order of time, famous poets and representative works are selected. In addition to learning the basic knowledge of ci style and meter, it also focuses on the appreciation and analysis of classical ci works. It is hoped that students will be able to understand the historical context of the development of Ci while cultivating their spirituality.
goal.ch: 本課程從唐五代詞開始講授至南宋詞為止，依時代先後為序，精選著名詞人及代表作品。 除了學習詞的體式、格律等基本知識外，亦著重古典詞作的欣賞和分析。期許學生涵泳性靈的同時，亦能明瞭詞學發展的歷史脈絡。

content.en:
Northern Song Ci - Yan Shu, Ouyang Xiu, Yan Jidao, Liu Yong, Su Shi, Qin Guan, Zhou Bangyan
Southern Song Ci - Li Qingzhao, Xin Qiji, Jiang Kui, Wu Wenying
content.ch:
(1) 緒論(1)：詞的性質
講義─繆鉞〈論詞〉，《詩詞散論》，臺北：臺灣開明書店
(2) 緒論(2)：詞的概說
講義─教師自編
(3) 唐宋詞的發展
晚唐五代詞─溫庭筠、韋莊、馮延巳、李煜
北宋詞─晏殊、歐陽修、晏幾道、柳永、蘇軾、秦觀、周邦彥
南宋詞─李清照、辛棄疾、姜夔、吳文英
遺民詞─王沂孫、周密、張炎
